definition.usage: This is a template for setting up a stake pool.
definition.description: Set up a Cardano stake pool.
definition.summary: At the end of this learning project, you will be able to set up a Cardano stake pool.

outcomes.description: Know what a Cardano stake pool is and how it helps secure the Cardano network.
How to build a stake pool.
How to operate a stake pool.

rules.subject: Critical Milestone
rules.description: Must be ready for community showcase.

rules.subject: Team size
rules.description: Individual or pairs (larger groups must be teacher certified).

tasks.subject: Research Cardano Basics
tasks.description: Learn about Cardano blockchain and staking concepts.

milestones.subject: Technical Requirements and Setup
milestones.description: Setting up nodes and understanding requirements.

tasks.subject: Setup Relay Node
tasks.description: Configure and set up a relay node.

milestones.subject: Security Considerations
milestones.description: Learn best practices for securing a stake pool.

tasks.subject: Key Management
tasks.description: Understand key management and secure key storage.

milestones.subject: Stake Pool Registration and Configuration
milestones.description: Registering and configuring the stake pool.

tasks.subject: Register Stake Pool
tasks.description: Register the stake pool on the Cardano network.

tasks.subject: Performance Monitoring
tasks.description: Use tools to monitor stake pool performance.

milestones.subject: Community Engagement and Marketing
milestones.description: Engaging with the community and marketing the pool.

tasks.subject: Social Media Presence
tasks.description: Create and maintain social media channels for the stake pool.

tasks.subject: Legal Research
tasks.description: Research legal considerations for running a stake pool.
